definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cease, cause to cease, cut off, destroy—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Perf. 1 s. [[דָּמִיתִי]] Je 6:2, [[וְדָמִ֫יתִי]] consec. Ho 4:5; Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּדְמֶה]] La 3:49; 3 fpl. juss. [[תִּדְמֶינׇה]] Je 14:17; —
intr. cease Je 14:17 (eyes from weeping) La 3:49 (id.)
cause to cease, cut off, destroy, c. acc. Israel (under fig. of [[בת־חיון]]) Je 6:2; (under fig. of [[אִמֶָּךָ]]) Ho 4:5.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִדְמָה]] Is 15:1, Is 15:1 +; 3 fs. [[נִדְמְתָה]] Je 47:15; 2 ms. [[נִדְמֵיתָה]] Ob:Ob 5, [[נִדְמֵיתָ]] Ez Eze 32:2; 1 s. [[נִדְמֵיתִי]] Is 6:5; 3 pl. [[נִדְמוּ]] Ho 4:6 +; Inf. abs. [[נִדְמׂה]] Ho 10:15; Pt. [[נִדְמֶה]] Ho 10:7; be cut off, destroyed, ruined, of a city Is 15:1, Is 15:1 (‖[[שֻׁדַּד]]) Je 47:5; of people Ho 4:6, Zep 1:11, Ob:Ob 5; of king Ho 10:7, Ho 10:15, Ho 10:15 cf. Ez Eze 32:2; of beasts Ps 49:12, Ps 49:20; be ruined, undone, prophet at sight of Yahweh Is 6:5.
